ProjectTitle: Construction Digital Twins for automated digital construction site monitoring
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/06/2022
4. Metadata: are you collecting any metadata with your measurements, is this maybe in the .txt files that explain the contents of the data? Camera's and sensors often generate metadata according to a standard, regular cameras mostly use DCIM for example. Please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you like to discuss this in more detail. 
7. Sharing: Under 3 you mention 3rd party agreements, do these affect sharing? Please also note the KU Leuven now has an institutional data repository that you can use for data preservation and sharing: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
